text: The kings (mbangs) or sultans of Bagirmi ruled the sultanate of Bagirmi in central Africa (mostly within present-day Chad). They include: {| border=1 style="border-collapse: collapse" |- align=left ! width="20%"|Tenure ! width="40%"|Incumbent ! width="15%"|Notes |- valign=top |c. 1480 ||colspan="2"|Foundation of Baguirmi
